featured.name: All American Rejects
featured.description:
Band o’ Oklahoma brothers, The All- American Rejects, continue their modern rock multi-platinum and number one success with their third CD When the World Comes Down and constant live shows. 

http://www.allamericanrejects.com
featured.author: allamericanrejects

featured.name: Generation Fame
featured.description:
A dynamic reinvention of the Oscar®-winning film and globally successful TV series, FAME captures the visceral excitement and explosive energy of young artists and performers struggling to prove their talent and find their own voice. Caught up in the intense atmosphere of a performing arts high school in New York, they confront both the tantalizing promise of success, and the challenges of thriving in a highly competitive environment.
http://www.generationfame.com
featured.author: MGM

featured.name: Anna Sui Figures
featured.description:
Anna Sui has a worldwide cult following who look to her each season for ironic mixes of romantic nostalgia and rock-and-roll glam.  Her clothing, perfume, cosmetic and accessory lines are available in over 50 countries and in 300 stores worldwide.              

http://www.annasui.com
featured.author: ANNASUI

popular.name: Endless Possibilities by Etsu
popular.description: Etsu Meusy’s work has been described as “sunny and clean” by Giant Robot and “nostalgia-tinged 70s and 80s pop cultural pastiches” by Coolhunting. Etsu blends together paint, hand drawn typography and the odd guest appearance from 80s icons like Axl Rose and the Smurfs to create dreamy rainbow colored landscapes. Her artwork has been featured in Nylon magazine and art books by Die Gestalten.
popular.author: Infectious

popular.name: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince 1
popular.description: As Voldemort tightens his grip on Hogwarts, Harry and Dumbledore work to find the key to unlock the Dark Lord’s defenses. But the students are under attack from a very different adversary—teenage hormones.  Love is in the air, but tragedy lies ahead and Hogwarts may never be the same again. http://www.harrypotter.com and http://www.harrypotter.co.uk.
popular.author: Warner Bros. Pictures

popular.name: Bob Marley
popular.description:
Today’s hottest producers have remixed classics from beloved Reggae legend Bob Marley. Roots, Rock, Remixed uses bass-heavy digital technology available today while balancing respect for the inimitable Marley and the gorgeous analog originals. “Roots, Rock, Remixed  
retains the songs and spirit of the original Wailers’ recordings and creates a great dance party record.” Chris Blackwell (Island Records). http://www.rockrmusic.com 
 / http://www.rockrivermusic.com

personas.name: Beach Bum
personas.description: It all began fifty years ago when a young, sassy, New York socialite named Lilly McKim Pulitzer opened a simple juice stand in Palm Beach in the 1950's. The citrus stains that splashed upon her clothing inspired her to create the brightly colored designs which became the unofficial uniform of the affluent at play, and Lilly's signature prints emerged as the banner of the authentic Palm Beach lifestyle. For more information and to shop please visit http://www.lillypulitzer.com

Or, if you just happen to be the Roman god of erotic love and beauty Cupid, then you'll really dig this.
Visit the following URL to get toolbar buttons that compliments (better matches) this Persona.
